name: Košice City Park
description: A peaceful green escape in the heart of the city.

quests.goal: Take a picture of the main fountain.
quests.educational_info: The park dates back to the 19th century and is one of the oldest in Slovakia.

quests.goal: Find and identify three different species of trees.
quests.educational_info: Over 40 tree species grow here, making it a small botanical collection.

quests.goal: Walk from the south entrance to the café without using the main path.
quests.educational_info: The park’s layout was inspired by English landscape gardens.

name: Spiš Castle
description: A grand medieval castle complex in eastern Slovakia.

quests.goal: Climb to the upper courtyard and enjoy the panoramic view.
quests.educational_info: Spiš Castle is one of the largest castle sites in Central Europe.

quests.goal: Najdi starú kaplnku a popíš jednu unikátnu vlastnosť.
quests.educational_info: Kaplnka na hrade je zo skorého 13. storočia.

quests.goal: Walk the entire castle perimeter wall.
quests.educational_info: The defensive wall stretches over 400 meters and was vital in medieval defense.

quests.goal: Find the information board about archaeological excavations.
quests.educational_info: Excavations revealed ancient settlements dating back to the 5th century BC.
